DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether titrated solution oral Misoprostol safe effective induce labor term , regardless Bishop Score .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Titrated Oral Misoprostol Solution Labor Induction Term
DOC.criteria: 1. term , 2. singleton 3. contraindication prostaglandin 4. vertex 5. exposure vaginal prostaglandin index pregnancy 1. parity > 3 2. severe PIH : BP > 160/100 , abnormal LFT 's , proteinuria > 1g/day 3. previous uterine surgery 4. regular uterine contraction 5. maternal age > 45 6. twin
